00039                 IN OUT TCHAR *szEventSession, IN DWORD ccEventSession,
00040                 IN OUT TCHAR *szEventName, IN DWORD ccEventName,
00041                 IN OUT TCHAR *szEventReturn, IN DWORD ccEventReturn);

00049         {
00050                 return CBaseMgr::SetEscape(tcEscape);
00051         }
